description: Information relating to copays collected using the POS or Registration copay forms (not the AR copay form).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Used to indicate which copay the data applies to on the appointment: the 1st copay, 2nd, nth.

columns.name: E_PMT_BANK_ACCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The bank account type for bank account transactions.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unknown


Checking


Savings

columns.name: SCANNED_CHECK_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a transaction was made using a scanned check.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
